Tips Bermain Mobile Legends Agar Tidak Gampang Tercyduk Musuh
02 Nov 2019, 04:09 by Mansur
Tips Bertahan di Mobile Legends 
Oketekno – Salah satu kejadian paling nyebelin ketika bermain Mobile Legends yakni ketika kalian terculik oleh musuh. Memang sih kita bisa respawn di base, akan tetapi selama kita mengalami waktu cooldown ini maka team kita akan dirugikan, sebab jumlahnya tidak seimbang lagi dan mudah untuk dilakukan push.
Kematian 1 orang dalam game MLBB ini sangat berarti bagi musuh, sehingga kita jangan sampai menyia-nyiakan nyawa dan jangan sampai tercyduk oleh musuh, dan berkontribusi terus dalam team untuk farming, ataupun push turret.

Simak Nih: 

3 Hero Mobile Legends yang Paling Sering Bikin Bete Pengguna Baxia


Agar kejadian semacam ini tidak menimpa kalian, berikut ini sederet Tips bertahan hidup di Mobile Legends yang bisa kalian terapkan dengan mudah di game berikutnya.


Copyright ©duniagames



Perhatikan Health Bar


Salah satu yang paling penting adalah tetap memperhatikan Health Bar, ketika sudah menipis, jangan lupa untuk melakukan regenerasi atau kembali ke base untuk melakukan restart HP dan Mana. Jangan biarkan hero kalian melakukan war ketika Health Bar dalam keadaan kritis, meski kalian punya efek regen HP gila seperti Alucard sekalipun.


Jangan Memaksakan Diri


Ketika musuh HP miliknya sudah tipis dan mundur, kalian juga harus pertimbangkan untuk kejar atau tidak. Saat kalian memiliki skill dash, ataupun punya flicker, tidak begitu masalah untuk mengejar. Dikarenakan khawatirnya, ketika kalian mengejar malah sudah ditungguin oleh pemain lawan di tempat tertentu. Jadi rugi sendiri bukan?

Ketahui Yuk: 

Cara Menggunakan Masha, Hero Solo Lane Paling Berbahaya




Sering Bersama Teman


Jangan berpetualang sendiri ketika bermain game Mobile Legends ini, kecuali hero tank ataupun fighter atau hero yang punya pergerakan super lincah. Dikarenakan, saat berpetualang sendiri, kesempatan di cyduk lebih besar. Jadi hero-hero berjenis Marksman, Mage, Support, atau hero dengan Def. kecil lainnya bisa bersama team terus.


Jangan Lupa Item Bertahan


Bukan berarti sebagai hero Carrie kalian harus full attack untuk itemnya, dikarenakan seperti apapun kalian mencoba menyerang, pasti ada yang mengincar. Jadi jangan lupakan item defense, 1 item saja sudah cukup. Namun kalau tank dalam team kurang memadai, bisa memakai 2 item def. untuk hero dengan tingkat kelincahan yang kecil.
Itulah beberapa tips bermain Mobile Legends agar tidak mudah tercyduk oleh musuh yang bisa kalian coba terapkan. Selamat bermain.

Tips for Playing Mobile Legends So It Is Not Easily Shaken by Enemies
02 Nov 2019, 04:09 by Mansur
Tips for Surviving Mobile Legends
Oketekno - One of the most annoying incidents when playing Mobile Legends is when you are kidnapped by the enemy. Sure, we can respawn at the base, but as long as we experience cooldown time, our team will be disadvantaged, because the numbers are no longer balanced and easy to do push.
The death of 1 person in this MLBB game is very meaningful to the enemy, so we don't waste our lives and don't get hit by the enemy, and continue to contribute to the team for farming, or push turrets.

Listen Here:

3 Hero Mobile Legends that Most Often Make Bete Users Baxia


So that events like this do not happen to you, here are a series of tips for survival in Mobile Legends that you can apply easily in the next game.


Copyright © duniagames



Pay attention to the Health Bar


One of the most important is to pay attention to the Health Bar, when it is running low, don't forget to regenerate or return to base to restart HP and Mana. Don't let your hero war when the Health Bar is in critical condition, even though you have the effect of a crazy HP regen like Alucard.


Do not push yourself


When the enemy's HP is thin and back, you should also consider chasing or not. When you have dash skills, or have a flicker, it's not a problem to catch up. Due to worry, when you chase, you have been waiting for by an opposing player in a certain place. So the loss itself is not it?

Let's Know:

How to Use Masha, the Most Dangerous Solo Lane Hero




Often with Friends


Do not adventure yourself when playing this Mobile Legends game, except tank hero or fighter or hero who has super-agile movements. Because, when adventuring alone, the chance at Cyduk is greater. Be a Marksman, Mage, Support, or hero hero with Def. other small can continue with the team.


Don't Forget an Enduring Item


Not that as a Carrie hero you have to attack full for the item, because no matter what you try to attack, there must be someone aiming for. So don't forget about defense items, just one item is enough. But if the tanks in the team are inadequate, you can use 2 def items. for heroes with a small level of agility.
Those are some tips for playing Mobile Legends so they are not easily caught by enemies that you can try to apply. Have a nice play.
